body:
Comment 2 by **anwar.root**: 
Test.go
+++++++++++++++++++
package main

import "fmt"

// #cgo CFLAGS: -I.
// #cgo LDFLAGS: -L. -lfoo 
// #include "foo.h"
import "C"

func main() {
  fmt.Printf("Invoking c library...\n")
  fmt.Println("Done ", C.x(10) )
}

// gcc -O2 -c foo.c
// ar q libfoo.a foo.o
